publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: A Catalogue of other printed Books of Sr. Henry Spelmans, which are to be sold by Philemon Stephens at the gilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard.

monogr.title: A heavenly hymne to the king of heaven. Presented in a sermon, by Iames Eglesfield, Mr. of Arts in Queenes Colledge in Oxon late Vicar of Chewton in Sommerset
monogr.author: Eglesfield, James

div.head: A Catalogue of other printed Books of Sr. Henry Spelmans, which are to be sold by Philemon Stephens at the gilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard.

list.item: 1. COncilia, Decreta, Leges, Constitutiones de Re Ecclesiarum Orbis Britannici, ab initio Christianae ibidem Religionis; cum Annotationibus non minus piis quam doctis: Opus Antiquitatis studiosis apprime gratum & utile.
2. Glossarium eruditissimum: in que prisci Ritus quamplurimi, Magistratus, Dignitates, Munera, Officia, Mores, Leges, & Consuetudines enarrantur.
3. Psalterium Davidis Latino-Saxonicum, à Jo. Spelmanno, Henrici F. è Patus Bibliotheca in lucem editum: ubi ad finem uniuscujusque Psalmi preces optimae in animum Psalmi reperiuntur.
4. De non temerandis Ecclesiis, or, Of the right and respect due unto Churches, which are not to be violated.
